Orange COUNTY OF 1204PG I 864 CURITY TITLE On June 13, 1974 before me, the undersigned, a Notary Public in and for said County and State, personally appeared FOIA (b) (6) FOR NOTARY SEAL OR STAMP known to me to be the person whose name is subscribed to the within instrument, as a witness thereto, who being by me duly sworn, deposed and said: That he resides at Anaheim and he present and saw FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b) (6) him personally known to to be the same person described in, and whose name is subscribed to the within annexed instrument, 2th, 1978 execute the same; and that affiant subscribed his name thereto as witness.
